headline: Illinois Tool Works Inc (ITW) Q2 2025 Earnings Call Highlights: Record EPS and Strategic Growth ...
summary: Illinois Tool Works Inc (ITW) sets new records with a GAAP EPS of $2.58 and a robust operating margin, while expanding significantly in the Asia Pacific region.
